column1: The Role of User Location in Personalized Search and Recommendation

column2: users no longer access the web from specific locations
column3: but virtually from anywhere. How does this affect our ability to provide personalized information for users' In this talk
column4: I will discuss the influence of location activity on users' information needs and how a better understanding of these needs can help enhance web applications in which personalization plays a central role.
